text: Watch Live: Trump speaks after U.S. carried out Venezuelan strikes, Maduro capture - CBS News
fullText: President Trump said the U.S. would "run the country" of Venezuela until "a safe, proper and judicious transition," following the U.S. military operation that captured Nicolás Maduro.

text: Ohio police search for suspect after dentist, wife found murdered at home - ABC News
Important Travel Update for San Juan Disembarkation. - Virgin Voyages
fullText: Virgin Voyages is issuing the following update regarding travel disruptions affecting sailors disembarking in San Juan today.

text: Earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 6.5 rattles southern and central Mexico - ABC News
fullText: A strong earthquake rattled southern and central Mexico, interrupting President Claudia Sheinbaum’s first press briefing of the new year as seismic alarms sounded

text: A new mom battling postpartum depression skipped a routine appointment. An unrelated visit led to an unexpected diagnosis. - CBS News
fullText: Postpartum depression and a busy home life kept Ameilia Boodoosingh Gopie from her regular appointments.

text: The largest sun of 2026 rises today as Earth draws closest to our parent star - Space
fullText: Earth reaches its closest point to the sun in its 2026 orbit on Jan. 3.

text: Tesla sales hit lowest point since 2022 after Musk backlash and end of tax credit - Axios
fullText: Vehicle sales are critical to funding CEO Elon Musk's AI ambitions.

text: Victoria Jones, daughter of Tommy Lee Jones, found dead in hotel on New Year's Day - NBC News
fullText: The daughter of Academy Award-winning actor Tommy Lee Jones has died, her family acknowledged in a statement on Friday night.

text: Yemen clashes bring Saudi and UAE-backed forces into confrontation - BBC
fullText: It comes after clashes and an independence bid in southern Yemen bring Saudi and UAE-backed forces into confrontation.

text: Panthers could be first team since merger to make playoffs with no wins as favorites - NBC Sports
fullText: The Panthers can make the playoffs in 2025, either by beating the Buccaneers on Saturday or by watching the Falcons beat the Saints on Sunday.

text: What weather forecast for 49ers-Seahawks on Saturday has in store for Brock Purdy - San Francisco Chronicle
fullText: In what figures to be a welcome forecast for the San Francisco 49ers and quarterback Brock Purdy, the weather in Santa Clara on Saturday might not be too messy.

text: DHS hypes worksite enforcement as fraud allegations rip through Minnesota - Axios
fullText: Sec. Noem says there's "more coming" as ICE focuses on businesses.

text: As Ohio teen dies, flu cases rise in the Valley - WFMJ.com
fullText: Mahoning County reported 34 people hospitalized for the flu. Trumbull County had 17 hospitalizations, and Columbiana County had four.

text: Is Trump taking too much aspirin? Here's what experts say - NPR
fullText: Trump takes four times the recommended dose of aspirin for cardiac prevention. Even low-dose aspirin is no longer recommended for people over 60 who don't have heart disease.

text: The latest numbers as flu cases continue to climb across Texas - ABC13 Houston
fullText: ABC13 is continuing to monitor flu cases as they climb nationwide and here in Houston.

text: The year's first meteor shower and supermoon to overlap in the sky - PBS
fullText: The Quadrantid meteor shower peaks Friday night into Saturday morning, but fewer than 10 meteors will be visible per hour due to light from Saturday's supermoon.

text: Today's NYT Connections Hints, Answers and Help for Jan. 3, #937 - CNET
fullText: Here's today's Connections answer and hints for groups. These clues will help you solve New York Times' popular puzzle game, Connections, every day!

text: South Carolina measles outbreak grows to 185 cases amid vaccination worries - Al Jazeera
fullText: The outbreak comes after the US charted its highest number of annual measles cases in more than three decades in 2025.

text: Researchers spot Saturn-sized planet in the “Einstein desert” - Ars Technica
fullText: Rogue, free-floating planets appear to have two distinct origins.

text: Study identifies our likely earliest ancestor after split from chimp - Haaretz
fullText: Sahelanthropus tchadensis was small and it looked like a chimp but new analysis of old bones, helped by feeling them, finds a feature no ape ever had
